post.desc:
Huh... if Zanmu is really the same Nichihaku Zanmu, then her Buddhism would be [**Rinzai Zen**](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rinzai_school). So while still Mahayana like Byakuren, it's a whole different school of thought – both stemmed from China though, Zhēnyán and Línjì.

Huh... Reimu's ability to fly in the "air" is actually really special. 空 can also mean emptiness in a philosophical context. It is impermanence. It is detachment. Reimu's true ability is not flight. It is to not be bound by anything. Kinda like the Heroes of *The Elder Scrolls*. Or Xiaoli from *Baki*.

And then we contrast Reimu's impermanent void with Zanmu's nihilistic void.
